com.microsoft.azure.datalake.store

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.datalake.store.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends Object
    Utility methods to enable one-liners for simple functionality. The methods are all based on calls to the SDK methods, these are just convenience methods for common tasks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void upload(String filename, byte[] contents, IfExists mode)
      Uploads the contents of byte array to an Azure Data Lake file.
      void upload(String filename, InputStream in, IfExists mode)
      Uploads an InputStream to an Azure Data Lake file.
      void upload(String filename, String localFilename, IfExists mode)
      Uploads the contents of a local file to an Azure Data Lake file.

    • Method Detail

      • upload

        public void upload(String filename,
                   String localFilename,
                   IfExists mode)
            throws IOException
        Uploads the contents of a local file to an Azure Data Lake file.
        Parameters:
        filename - path of file to upload to
        localFilename - path to local file
        mode - IfExists enum specifying whether to overwite or throw an exception if the file already exists
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown on error

      • upload

        public void upload(String filename,
                   InputStream in,
                   IfExists mode)
            throws IOException
        Uploads an InputStream to an Azure Data Lake file.
        Parameters:
        filename - path of file to upload to
        in - InputStream whose contents will be uploaded
        mode - IfExists enum specifying whether to overwite or throw an exception if the file already exists
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown on error

      • upload

        public void upload(String filename,
                   byte[] contents,
                   IfExists mode)
            throws IOException
        Uploads the contents of byte array to an Azure Data Lake file.
        Parameters:
        filename - path of file to upload to
        contents - byte array containing the bytes to upload
        mode - IfExists enum specifying whether to overwite or throw an exception if the file already exists
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown on error
